actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A concurrent resolution relating to the authority of the Federal Trade Commission to prescribe rules preempting State and local laws.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Congress has not delegated to the Federal Trade Commission any authority to preempt the laws of the States and their political subdivisions.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution relating to the authority of the Federal Trade Commission to prescribe rules preempting State and local laws.
